hotels.title: Coastal California Escape Overlooking Monterey Bay with Hot Tub, Day Spa & Waterfront Dining
hotels.description: Breathe in the Californian sea breeze with a cosy coastal stay at InterContinental The Clement Monterey, an IHG Hotel. Set along the historic Cannery Row and overlooking the breathtaking Monterey Bay, you'll be all set to savour fresh, locally sourced seafood at waterfront C Restaurant + Bar, and sip handcrafted cocktails alfresco style at C Patio. For an extra slice of head-to-toe rejuvenation, head to the hotel's tranquil day spa, heated pool or hot tub.
